query:
WITH suspend AS (
                        UPDATE v2_job_queue SET suspend = $2, suspend_until = now() + $3
                        WHERE id = $4
                        RETURNING id
                    ) UPDATE v2_job_flow_runtime SET flow_status = JSONB_SET(
                        flow_status,
                        ARRAY['modules', flow_status->>'step'::TEXT],
                        $1
                    ) WHERE id = (SELECT id FROM suspend)
